input_text:
Job Title: Sr. Software Engineer

Location: Overland Park, KS

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
We are seeking a skilled and motivated Senior Software Engineer to join our dynamic team. As a Senior Software Engineer, you will play a key role in contributing to the development of software solutions. This position involves hands-on coding, problem resolution, cross-team collaboration, and active participation in the software development lifecycle. This is an excellent opportunity for a talented engineer to make significant contributions to the success of our projects and advance their technical skills in a collaborative environment.   

A day in the life!

You will be responsible for the following:

Performing all commercial software development duties, including but not limited to technical design, coding, and unit testing so that high quality commercial software releases are delivered to clients in a predictable and consistent schedule according to WellSky development processesCollaborating with solutions team(s) to define requirements, conducting analysis, and solving problems on a single product/servicePreparing technical documentation, conducting, and participating in code reviews to ensure that commercial software code meets internal standards and follows industry best practices and the highest qualityOffering technical direction and guidance to other product development team members and assisting in managing development environments as well as installing and configuring commercial products

Do you have what it takes?

Required Qualifications:

Bachelor's degree in a related field or equivalent work experience4-6 years of related work experience with a solid understanding of UI development fundamentalsProficiency in Angular 8+Git experience

Do you stand above the rest?

Preferred Qualifications:

 Proficient in .NETMust understand product specifications and user mindset and predict what might work for bothExperience with an Agile Scrum methodologyCloud technologies such as GCP, AWS or AzureDevOps and SRE experience (Azure pipelines, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform)Experience in healthcare domainBasic understanding of HL7 standards

Additional job expectations applicable to this position include:

Willingness to work additional or irregular hours as neededWorking in accordance with corporate and organizational security policies and proceduresPerforming other responsibilities as assigned

WellSky is where independent thinking and collaboration come together to create an authentic culture. We thrive on innovation, inclusiveness, and cohesive perspectives. At WellSky you can make a difference.

WellSky provides equal employment opportunities to all people without regard to race, color, national origin, ancestry, citizenship, age, religion, gender, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, marital status, pregnancy, physical or mental disability, protected medical condition, genetic information, military service, veteran status, or any other status or characteristic protected by law. WellSky is proud to be a drug-free workplace.

Applicants for U.S.-based positions with WellSky must be legally authorized to work in the United States. Verification of employment eligibility will be required at the time of hire. Certain client-facing positions may be required to comply with applicable requirements, such as immunizations and occupational health mandates.

Here are some of the exciting benefits full-time teammates are eligible to receive at WellSky:

Excellent medical, dental, and vision benefitsMental health benefits through TelaDocPrescription drug coverageGenerous paid time off, plus 13 paid holidaysPaid parental leave100% vested 401(K) retirement plansEducational assistance up to $2500 per year

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: Sr. Software Engineer
output_json.summary: Seeking a skilled and motivated Senior Software Engineer to contribute to software development.
preferred_degrees: Bachelor's degree in a related field
job_responsibilities: Performing all commercial software development duties
